description.value:
• Cost: 1
  • Effect: Make opposed [[/check skill=athletics]] (Strength + Athletics vs target's Athletics or Acrobatics)
  • Success: Push target 5 feet away from you OR knock them Prone (your choice)
  • Notes:
    • Target must be no more than one size larger than you
    • Subject to Multiple Action Penalty
    • Doesn't deal damage

system.effect:
Make opposed Athletics check (Strength + Athletics vs target's Athletics or Acrobatics)
- **Success:** Push target 5 feet away from you OR knock them Prone (your choice)
- **Notes:**
  - Target must be no more than one size larger than you
  - Subject to Multiple Action Penalty
  - Doesn't deal damage
